verses.content: Chun, vântirko vânsam chabi le khaidiet lientak chawia, vâna inthawka hung ṭum ka hmuh a.
Drakon, rûlpui tar chu (chu chu Diebol le Setan a nih) a man a, kum sâng khata dingin a khuop a,
vânsama chun a pei lût a, a khâr khum a, kum sâng khat chu ân vawi hmakhat chu hnam tin a hlêm nâwk ta nawna dingin a châr nel tah a; chu hnunga chun sâwtnawtêa dingin insuo nâwk ding a nih.

Chun, lalṭhungphahai ka hmuh a, a chungah mi an ṭhung a, an kuoma chun rorêlna an pêk a. Chun, Isu inhriettirna thu lei le, Pathien thu leia lu tanhai thlarau le sahrâng le a lim chibai bûk loa, an bâwka manih, an kuta manih inchikna nei nawhai thlarau chu ka hmu bawk a. Chuonghai chu an hung hring a, kum sâng khat sûnga dingin Krista leh rorêlin an um a.
(Mithi danghai ruok chu kum sâng khat chu ân vawi hmakhat chu an la hring hri nawh a.) Chu chu thonâwkna hmasa chu a nih.

Thonâwkna hmasaa ṭhanghai chu an hamṭhain an inthieng a nih; chuonghai chunga chun thi hnina chun thu hrim a nei nawh a. Pathien le Krista thiempuhai nîng an ta, ama leh kum sâng khat rorêlin um lem an tih.
Chun, kum sâng khat chu ân vawi pha chun Setan chu ân tângnaa inthawka insuoin um a ta,
hnuoi kil lia hnamhai, Gog le Magog chu, hlêma, indonaa ṭhuoi khâwm dingin fe suok a tih; chuong- hai tamzie chu tuisuorieta phaiphin ang el an nih.
Chun, hnuoi khang tieng dâpin a tungin an fe a, mi inthienghai le khuo ditumtak chu an inhuol tah a, chun, vâna inthawkin mei a hung tlah a, anni chu a kânghmang tah a.
Chun, anni hlêmtu, Diebol chu Sahrâng le zâwlnei tehlêm umna, mei le kât dîla chun an pei tah a; chuongchun, chatuonin a sûn a zâna sawisakin um an tih.
Chun, lalṭhungpha lientak vâr- tak le a chunga ṭhung chu ka hmuh a, a hmaa inthawk chun hnuoi le vân an tlân hmang a, an ta dingin hmun hrim a um ta nawh a.
Chun, mithihai a lien a chîn, lalṭhungpha hmaa ngîr ka hmuh a. Chun, mithihai chu lekhabuhaia ziek an thilthaw ang peiin rêlpêkin an um tah a.
Tuisuoriet chun a sûnga mithi umhai chu ân suoktir a, Thina le Mithi Khuo chun an sûnga mithi umhai chu an insuoktir bawk a; chun, mi tin an thilthaw ang peia rêlpêkin an um tah a.
Chun, Thina le Mithi Khuohai chu mei dîlah an pei a. Chu chu thi hnina chu a nih–mei dîl chu.
Tûkhawm Hringna Buah a hming ziek an hmu naw chun mei dilah an pei bawk a.
